text: @mattgaetz Hey Numb Nuts, this is America under your and @realDonaldTrump leadership.   Record unemployment, record negative GDP, record loss of American lives due to inability to manage healthcare crisis.   Letting adversaries grow stronger.  You suck more than a @Dyson #coronavirus
